title: Table column headers and cells are misplaced
content: When the grid table header is misplaced with the table body cell, You can perform the following operations as required. 1. Set the column width for each column. 2. Set show-overflow and show-header-overflow to true 3. Set table-layoutauto
findIntroStr: Table component, which provides powerful data table functions. In Grid, data lists can be displayed, selected, and edited.
